name: Gun&Guard
description:
When the jam theme was announced, we though of a co-op game where one player is controlled by a human and the other one by an AI. In our game the player has the role of a guard with a big shield that protects his gun-wielding buddy.  Together these two try to hijack a spaceship. Therefore they have to shoot their way through endless corridors.

Move with WASD, dash with SPACE, bash with your shield with LMB.

Try to protect your buddy.
